output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the established criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - "CMF 11240014" is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral propaganda material.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - Explicitly mentions "George Simion" as presidential candidate ("pentru susținerea lui George Simion - PREŞEDINTE").
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement with significant reach (70,000-79,999 impressions) - Targets a broad audience on Facebook and Instagram - Uses inclusive language ("Haideți să dăm împreună un vot")
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Explicitly calls for voting support - Promotes George Simion as presidential candidate - Makes campaign promises and presents a vision for leadership - Uses persuasive language to influence voting decisions
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content - Contains partisan messaging and direct calls to action - Lacks journalistic objectivity and reporting standards
6. Personal opinion: No - This is an official party communication (AUR local organization) - Contains structured campaign messaging - Has official CMF number

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Direct candidate promotion - Explicit call for votes - Paid distribution - Campaign promises and messaging - Official party channel communication
conclusion.message-for-police: AUR - Sălașu de Sus, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie, prin promovarea unui mesaj electoral explicit în favoarea candidatului George Simion și în defavoarea PSD, într-o postare sponsorizată pe Facebook și Instagram (ID: 555150543924818). Postarea conține număr CMF (11240014), îndemn direct la vot și promisiuni electorale, fiind difuzată după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, încălcând astfel prevederile legale privind încetarea campaniei electorale.
